Ability_1.Description: A six shot semi-automatic revolver that deals 520 damage per shot every 0.36s. Effective at Short Range.

Ability_2.Description: Quickly strike a nearby enemy, dealing 700 damage.

Ability_3.Description: Absorb all shots from the front. After 1.4s, fire a blast dealing 75% of the damage you absorbed.

Ability_4.Description: Quickly dash forward in any direction. Can be used three times before going on Cooldown. Hold Jump while in the air to reduce fall speed.

Ability_5.Description: Begin flying for 4s and mutate your Revolver to fire 4 explosive blasts that deal 1000 damage every 0.5s.

Lore: Once a noble lawman of the Outer Tribunal circuit judges, Androxus and his former partner, Lex, were relentless in their pursuit of criminals and threats to the natural order. After a tragic confrontation with a deceitful goddess, though, he became afflicted with an otherworldly disease dooming him with an endless hunger for souls. Now he wanders the realm adrift to feed that hunger, stripped of his rank and duties with the Tribunal, and condemned to live with the curse for all time.
Name: Androxus
Title: The Godslayer
abilityDescription1: A six shot semi-automatic revolver that deals 520 damage per shot every 0.36s. Effective at Short Range.
abilityDescription2: Quickly strike a nearby enemy, dealing 700 damage.
abilityDescription3: Absorb all shots from the front. After 1.4s, fire a blast dealing 75% of the damage you absorbed.
abilityDescription4: Quickly dash forward in any direction. Can be used three times before going on Cooldown. Hold Jump while in the air to reduce fall speed.
abilityDescription5: Begin flying for 4s and mutate your Revolver to fire 4 explosive blasts that deal 1000 damage every 0.5s.

Ability_1.Description: Fire a shrapnel round every 0.9s that explodes in an AOE dealing 400 damage.

Ability_2.Description: Superheat your next shrapnel round. When you next fire, the round will instantly explode in a frontal cone, dealing 450 damage and applying a knockback.

Ability_3.Description: Deploy a 5000 health siege shield that advances forward and lasts 6s.

Ability_4.Description: Lower your shoulder and hurtle forward. Hitting an enemy will deal 800 damage and apply a strong knockback.

Ability_5.Description: Leap forward and plant your Banner in the ground dealing 600 damage on impact and creating a Damage Immune zone for yourself that lasts 8s. You must remain in the zone to receive the Immunity.

Lore: Ash made a name for herself in the Magistrate army by volunteering for front-line duty using experimental heavy armor and siege weaponry. Lacking finesse or subtlety, she more than makes up for it with brutal tactics and overkill. The War Machine, as she is called by her allies and enemies alike, earned the title every time the dust settled and she was all that remained on the scorched battlefield. When the Resistance emerged and brought the war to Crosswind Hold, Ash led the charge against them with fury and determination.
Name: Ash
Title: The War Machine
abilityDescription1: Fire a shrapnel round every 0.9s that explodes in an AOE dealing 400 damage.
abilityDescription2: Superheat your next shrapnel round. When you next fire, the round will instantly explode in a frontal cone, dealing 450 damage and applying a knockback.
abilityDescription3: Deploy a 5000 health siege shield that advances forward and lasts 6s.
abilityDescription4: Lower your shoulder and hurtle forward. Hitting an enemy will deal 800 damage and apply a strong knockback.
abilityDescription5: Leap forward and plant your Banner in the ground dealing 600 damage on impact and creating a Damage Immune zone for yourself that lasts 8s. You must remain in the zone to receive the Immunity.

Ability_1.Description: A short range blunderbuss shooting 13 pellets that deal a total of 500 damage, every 1s. Effective at Short Range.

Ability_2.Description: Deploy a barricade that provides cover. Barricade has 5000 health and lasts 4s or until destroyed.

Ability_3.Description: Build a turret that fires at enemies for 120 damage every second and lasts until destroyed. You may deploy up to 2 turrets.

Ability_4.Description: A guided rocket charge that lasts 1s.

Ability_5.Description: Deploy a 20,000 health Dome Shield for 6s with a Flamethrower turret inside that deals 400 damage per second.

Lore: Long before he came to the Deepwerks and helped develop the crystal-powered technology spreading throughout the Realm, Barik was a clever inventor and resourceful engineer. Since then, his signature contributions have appeared in almost every field and vocation, from mechanized mining suits and rocket-powered wings to the crystalline weapons used by Magistrate and Resistance soldiers alike. After a falling out with the corrupt Magistrate commander assigned to oversee the security of the Deepwerks, he left and pledged his services to Valera and the Paladins.
Name: Barik
Title: The Master Mechanic
abilityDescription1: A short range blunderbuss shooting 13 pellets that deal a total of 500 damage, every 1s. Effective at Short Range.
abilityDescription2: Deploy a barricade that provides cover. Barricade has 5000 health and lasts 4s or until destroyed.
abilityDescription3: Build a turret that fires at enemies for 120 damage every second and lasts until destroyed. You may deploy up to 2 turrets.
abilityDescription4: A guided rocket charge that lasts 1s.
abilityDescription5: Deploy a 20,000 health Dome Shield for 6s with a Flamethrower turret inside that deals 400 damage per second.

Ability_1.Description: Throw a sticky bomb every 0.7s that will stick to enemy Champions for 2s, with a maximum of 6 out at once. Sticky Bombs deal 900 damage in an area when detonated.

Ability_2.Description: Detonate all active Sticky Bombs, causing them to explode.

Ability_3.Description: Throw a Grumpy Bomb that grows angrier over 3s, exploding dealing 800 damage and stunning all targets in range for 2s.

Ability_4.Description: Throw an unstable Poppy Bomb that sticks to any surface. Detonating this bomb applies a knockback.

Ability_5.Description: Roll into King Bomb for 5s. Explode and deal up to 2500 damage to targets near the center, knocking yourself back and stunning enemies. Ignores shields.

Lore: During a fortress siege long ago, a clever warlord decided that the best way to breach her enemy’s defenses was by creating walking bombs. Her warlock accidentally brought one of the larger bombs to life, creating the Bomb King. After destroying her entire army himself, Bomb King struck out on his own delusional quest to visit all the lands under his rule. The common folk know better than to offend or even stand very close to him, as his regal demeanor can instantly change to furious, explosive rage at any moment.
Name: Bomb King
Title: His Majesty
abilityDescription1: Throw a sticky bomb every 0.7s that will stick to enemy Champions for 2s, with a maximum of 6 out at once. Sticky Bombs deal 900 damage in an area when detonated.
abilityDescription2: Detonate all active Sticky Bombs, causing them to explode.
abilityDescription3: Throw a Grumpy Bomb that grows angrier over 3s, exploding dealing 800 damage and stunning all targets in range for 2s.
abilityDescription4: Throw an unstable Poppy Bomb that sticks to any surface. Detonating this bomb applies a knockback.
abilityDescription5: Roll into King Bomb for 5s. Explode and deal up to 2500 damage to targets near the center, knocking yourself back and stunning enemies. Ignores shields.

Ability_1.Description: A massive shotgun that fires 20 small pieces of shrapnel that deal up to 700 damage every 1s. Effective at Short Range.

Ability_2.Description: Fire a net that slows a single target by 50% for 2s and deals 200 damage.

Ability_3.Description: Channel your inner energy and heal for 1000 Health over 1.5s.

Ability_4.Description: Buck leaps an incredible height and distance.

Ability_5.Description: Go Buck Wild, refilling your ammo and causing your weapon to fire 60% faster for 6s.

Lore: Buck’s story is just as diverse and complicated as his fighting style, as one is the direct result of the other. Pulling from those experiences, he effectively combines the self-discipline of a devout monk, clever ambushes commonly used by underworld thugs, and the tactics and weaponry of a front-line soldier. Once a loyal member of the Magistrate’s own elite fighting group he has now returned to where it all began, Crosswind Hold, to join the Resistance in their struggle against the Magistrate.
Name: Buck
Title: The Unyielding
abilityDescription1: A massive shotgun that fires 20 small pieces of shrapnel that deal up to 700 damage every 1s. Effective at Short Range.
abilityDescription2: Fire a net that slows a single target by 50% for 2s and deals 200 damage.
abilityDescription3: Channel your inner energy and heal for 1000 Health over 1.5s.
abilityDescription4: Buck leaps an incredible height and distance.
abilityDescription5: Go Buck Wild, refilling your ammo and causing your weapon to fire 60% faster for 6s.

Ability_1.Description: A crossbow that deals 680 damage every .75 seconds.

Ability_2.Description: Shoot an arrow that deals 200 damage and blasts the target backward.

Ability_3.Description: Fire an explosive projectile that deals 450 damage.

Ability_4.Description: Quickly roll in the direction you are moving.

Ability_5.Description: Send your bird into the sky for 8s, revealing enemies to allies and granting you 30% movement speed and CC immunity.

Lore: Watching all her friends leave the Greenwood to join the fight against the Magistrate, Cassie lamented the curse that bound her bloodline to her family’s homeland. When a mysterious oracle offered her an escape from her obligations, she jumped at the chance, even though she knew the sacrifice she made would haunt her. Taking nothing but her father’s enchanted crossbow and her faithful hunting bird, Zigs, she raced off to join the Paladins in their resistance against the draconian Magistrate.
Name: Cassie
Title: The Hunter's Daughter
abilityDescription1: A crossbow that deals 680 damage every .75 seconds.
abilityDescription2: Shoot an arrow that deals 200 damage and blasts the target backward.
abilityDescription3: Fire an explosive projectile that deals 450 damage.
abilityDescription4: Quickly roll in the direction you are moving.
abilityDescription5: Send your bird into the sky for 8s, revealing enemies to allies and granting you 30% movement speed and CC immunity.

Ability_1.Description: Every 0.7s fire an explosive projectile that deals 850 damage. Reloading fires a slow traveling projectile that deals 1000 damage.

Ability_2.Description: Fire three projectiles that each deal 950 Damage after a 2s fuse.

Ability_3.Description: Hurl a piercing harpoon. Enemies hit by the harpoon take 800 damage and are slowed by 50% for 2s.

Ability_4.Description: Deploy up to two portals that you can travel between.

Ability_5.Description: Create a rift, after 2s Abyssal tentacles rip through reality dealing 4000 Damage in an area.

Lore: Admiral Dredge ruled the eight oceans as as the Realm’s most feared pirate, until one final treasure led to his doom. Dredge stole the Warders’ relics from the Paladins, but could not tame the dragons’ might. His ship was destroyed, his crew scattered, and Dredge sank to certain death in the the ocean’s depths. The Abyss intervened and bore Dredge back into the Realm of the living. Now the undead admiral sails the seas again. And none will take his treasure.
Name: Dredge
Title: Admiral of the Abyss
abilityDescription1: Every 0.7s fire an explosive projectile that deals 850 damage. Reloading fires a slow traveling projectile that deals 1000 damage.
abilityDescription2: Fire three projectiles that each deal 950 Damage after a 2s fuse.
abilityDescription3: Hurl a piercing harpoon. Enemies hit by the harpoon take 800 damage and are slowed by 50% for 2s.
abilityDescription4: Deploy up to two portals that you can travel between.
abilityDescription5: Create a rift, after 2s Abyssal tentacles rip through reality dealing 4000 Damage in an area.

Ability_1.Description: Bombard lesser creatures with explosive rockets that deal 850 damage per shot every 0.85s.

Ability_2.Description:
Spit out a loogie. Enemies hit by your flammable saliva take 150 damage and receive 30% additional damage from your attacks for 4s. 
Bonus Damage: Shoot your Fire Spit to cause an explosion that deals 1000 damage.

Ability_3.Description: Load all remaining rockets into your Launcher. Your next fire releases all of the pre-loaded rockets, creating larger explosions and dealing 250 damage per shot. Deals 200% more damage to shields.

Ability_4.Description: Jet upwards into the air. Hold <CMD=GBA_Jump> to use your booster.

Ability_5.Description: Unleash your fury and overclock your thrusters to deliver a high velocity punch that deals 100% of your target's maximum health as damage.

Lore: Born wingless as a mere wyrin underling to a vicious dragon, Drogoz escaped his servitude using a pair of crystal-fueled mechanical wings crafted by a clever dwarven engineer. The draconic blood in his veins pulsed with cruelty and greed, sending him on a Realm-wide rampage of destruction as he amassed his own horde, one that would rival that of the true dragons. As the war rages, Drogoz streaks through the sky above, swooping down to deal with his foes as quickly and violently as possible.
Name: Drogoz
Title: The Greedy
abilityDescription1: Bombard lesser creatures with explosive rockets that deal 850 damage per shot every 0.85s.
abilityDescription2:
Spit out a loogie. Enemies hit by your flammable saliva take 150 damage and receive 30% additional damage from your attacks for 4s. 
Bonus Damage: Shoot your Fire Spit to cause an explosion that deals 1000 damage.
abilityDescription3: Load all remaining rockets into your Launcher. Your next fire releases all of the pre-loaded rockets, creating larger explosions and dealing 250 damage per shot. Deals 200% more damage to shields.
abilityDescription4: Jet upwards into the air. Hold <CMD=GBA_Jump> to use your booster.
abilityDescription5: Unleash your fury and overclock your thrusters to deliver a high velocity punch that deals 100% of your target's maximum health as damage.

Ability_1.Description: An Ice Staff that fires a frozen blast dealing 850 damage every second that explodes in an area on impact.

Ability_2.Description: Become immune to all damage for 3s. Cannot move or attack.

Ability_3.Description: Teleport forward a short distance.

Ability_4.Description: Hop on your staff and take flight for 2s.

Ability_5.Description: Summon a massive ice storm that deals 40 damage every 0.25s, slows and Cripples targets inside, and lasts 6 seconds.

Lore: After cleverly tricking and imprisoning a great frost elemental in a magical gemstone, Evie went from apprentice sorceress to winter witch overnight. Though no longer welcome in her home village, which she left to an uncertain fate, she found her talents to be in high demand in the war against the Magistrate. Her true motivations are as mysterious as the exact details of her background, though, causing her allies to question her loyalty as well as how long she can really hope to keep the vengeful elemental contained.
Name: Evie
Title: The Winter Witch
abilityDescription1: An Ice Staff that fires a frozen blast dealing 850 damage every second that explodes in an area on impact.
abilityDescription2: Become immune to all damage for 3s. Cannot move or attack.
abilityDescription3: Teleport forward a short distance.
abilityDescription4: Hop on your staff and take flight for 2s.
abilityDescription5: Summon a massive ice storm that deals 40 damage every 0.25s, slows and Cripples targets inside, and lasts 6 seconds.

Ability_1.Description: A short range flamethrower that deals 35 damage per hit every 0.1s and applies a Damage Over Time effect for 200 damage over 2s. The Flame Lance recharges when not firing.

Ability_2.Description: Expand your shield to block 8,000 damage for 10s. You cannot attack while your shield is active.

Ability_3.Description: Shoot a ball of fire that deals 450 damage.

Ability_4.Description: Dash forward at great speed dealing 200 damage.

Ability_5.Description: Fernando and all allies within 70 units cannot be brought below 1500 HP or affected by Damage Over Time effects for 4s.

Lore: Though not of noble birth nor having any real combat training, Fernando assumed the mantle of knighthood when the knight he served met an untimely fate. From that moment on, he wandered from one heroic adventure to the next, making a name for himself throughout the Realm. When the Magistrate called on all loyal houses to join their efforts against the Resistance, he heeded their summons with pride. If his valor in combat and charming confidence can keep his allies from discovering his secret, he might just live to become the champion he knows he can be.
Name: Fernando
Title: The Self-Appointed Knight
abilityDescription1: A short range flamethrower that deals 35 damage per hit every 0.1s and applies a Damage Over Time effect for 200 damage over 2s. The Flame Lance recharges when not firing.
abilityDescription2: Expand your shield to block 8,000 damage for 10s. You cannot attack while your shield is active.
abilityDescription3: Shoot a ball of fire that deals 450 damage.
abilityDescription4: Dash forward at great speed dealing 200 damage.
abilityDescription5: Fernando and all allies within 70 units cannot be brought below 1500 HP or affected by Damage Over Time effects for 4s.

Ability_1.Description: Deal 330 damage every 0.5s in a medium spread. Healing allies builds your Wrath resource and increases your attack speed. Wrath decays over time.

Ability_2.Description: Target an ally near your reticle and cast a heal that heals for 1000 and then 500 over 2s.

Ability_3.Description: Summon a beam of searing light that travels forward. Enemies caught in its path are stunned for 1s and take an instant 400 Damage along with 20 damage every 0.05s they remain inside the beam.

Ability_4.Description: Propel yourself backwards and fire 3 attacks that seek out enemies, dealing 200 damage each.

Ability_5.Description: Channel the Pyre and become untargetable for 2s. Afterward, you and allies within 150ft of yourself gain 30% bonus weapon damage and 30% Movement speed for 8 seconds.

Lore: Sarah prayed to the Eternal Pyre for the strength to fight the Abyss, to avenge her fallen sister. Her prayers were answered. She was saved from the Abyss, and transformed into Furia: An avenging angel of cleansing flame incarnate. Now the former sisters stand opposed, vessels of otherworldly powers far beyond that of mere mortals.
Name: Furia
Title: Angel of Vengeance
abilityDescription1: Deal 330 damage every 0.5s in a medium spread. Healing allies builds your Wrath resource and increases your attack speed. Wrath decays over time.
abilityDescription2: Target an ally near your reticle and cast a heal that heals for 1000 and then 500 over 2s.
abilityDescription3: Summon a beam of searing light that travels forward. Enemies caught in its path are stunned for 1s and take an instant 400 Damage along with 20 damage every 0.05s they remain inside the beam.
abilityDescription4: Propel yourself backwards and fire 3 attacks that seek out enemies, dealing 200 damage each.
abilityDescription5: Channel the Pyre and become untargetable for 2s. Afterward, you and allies within 150ft of yourself gain 30% bonus weapon damage and 30% Movement speed for 8 seconds.

Ability_1.Description: A medium range staff that creates a channeled beam of lightning dealing 75 damage per hit every 0.1 seconds. Deals up to 30% more damage the longer you are on target.

Ability_2.Description: Fire a projectile that deals 150 damage and bounces between enemy players.

Ability_3.Description: Deploy a 1000 health totem up to 100 feet away that heals nearby for 420 Health every second and lasts 6 seconds.

Ability_4.Description: Become untargetable and gain 20% movement speed for 1s. Removes all debuffs on use.

Ability_5.Description: Surge with Power and take flight for 5s. Slow and strike nearby enemies for 200 damage while speeding up and healing nearby allies for 500 health every 0.5s.

Lore: Being struck by lightning once is usually more than enough to kill someone, but after dozens of strikes, Grohk was still standing. Though it took a while to realize Grohk had been imbued with the power to control the lightning itself, he put it to good use defending his tribe from a goblin attack that would have otherwise destroyed them. Seeing his power as a sign from the weather spirits, the rest of the Red River orcs immediately appointed him their chieftain. When the Realm erupted into civil war, he sensed another storm brewing and joined the battle on behalf of his tribe.
Name: Grohk
Title: The Lightning Orc
abilityDescription1: A medium range staff that creates a channeled beam of lightning dealing 75 damage per hit every 0.1 seconds. Deals up to 30% more damage the longer you are on target.
abilityDescription2: Fire a projectile that deals 150 damage and bounces between enemy players.
abilityDescription3: Deploy a 1000 health totem up to 100 feet away that heals nearby for 420 Health every second and lasts 6 seconds.
abilityDescription4: Become untargetable and gain 20% movement speed for 1s. Removes all debuffs on use.
abilityDescription5: Surge with Power and take flight for 5s. Slow and strike nearby enemies for 200 damage while speeding up and healing nearby allies for 500 health every 0.5s.

Ability_1.Description:
Hurl your axe dealing 300 damage.
Bonus Damage: The Axe deals more damage the further it travels, up to 750.

Ability_2.Description: Throw an axe dealing 400 damage and crippling affected enemies for 2s.

Ability_3.Description: Passively Heal nearby allies for 80 health a second. Activate this ability to heal nearby allies instantly for 900.

Ability_4.Description: Throw a vine, that latches onto the first ally or terrain that it touches then pull yourself towards it.

Ability_5.Description: Rapidly heal nearby allies for 2500 health per second for 5s.

Lore: The soul of the forest isn’t an invisible spirit or comforting poem about being one with nature, it’s an angry walking tree with a huge stone axe. After decades of peaceful slumber since the last time Grover had to walk the land and help put down the goblin scourge, he has awoken once again to find the forests of the Realm threatened by the spread of humanoid civilization, rampant industrialization, and the fires of war. Hoisting his trusty axe, he stomps into battle once again, intent on destroying anything and anyone who would harm the natural world.
Name: Grover
Title: The Wild
abilityDescription1:
Hurl your axe dealing 300 damage.
Bonus Damage: The Axe deals more damage the further it travels, up to 750.
abilityDescription2: Throw an axe dealing 400 damage and crippling affected enemies for 2s.
abilityDescription3: Passively Heal nearby allies for 80 health a second. Activate this ability to heal nearby allies instantly for 900.
abilityDescription4: Throw a vine, that latches onto the first ally or terrain that it touches then pull yourself towards it.
abilityDescription5: Rapidly heal nearby allies for 2500 health per second for 5s.

Ability_1.Description: Fire a burst of 3 projectiles dealing 225 damage each over 0.3s, every 1.25s at medium range.

Ability_2.Description: Enter a defensive state that lasts 5s where you and your deployables take 30% reduced damage and you take 40% increased healing.

Ability_3.Description: Deploy a wall that grows out of the ground and lasts 5s.

Ability_4.Description: Place a stone obelisk that pulses which slow enemies for 60% and deals 150 damage per second.

Ability_5.Description: Throw your spear, passing through shields and stunning any enemies within 40 units of its impact for 2s and dealing 500 damage.

Lore: One of the few remaining stagalla, Inara was reluctant but oath-bound to join the Paladins in their time of need. Originally created to help the ancient order repel the First Scourge of goblin encroachment, the stone people slumbered for generations before being summoned to battle once again. Inara was slow to act, but after witnessing the atrocities committed by the Magistrate, she threw herself into the fight on behalf of the Resistance, heeding the call of Valera and the Paladins once again.
Name: Inara
Title: The Stone Warden
abilityDescription1: Fire a burst of 3 projectiles dealing 225 damage each over 0.3s, every 1.25s at medium range.
abilityDescription2: Enter a defensive state that lasts 5s where you and your deployables take 30% reduced damage and you take 40% increased healing.
abilityDescription3: Deploy a wall that grows out of the ground and lasts 5s.
abilityDescription4: Place a stone obelisk that pulses which slow enemies for 60% and deals 150 damage per second.
abilityDescription5: Throw your spear, passing through shields and stunning any enemies within 40 units of its impact for 2s and dealing 500 damage.

Ability_1.Description: An otherworldly weapon that channels the power of the stars. Deals 108 damage every 0.13s at medium range.

Ability_2.Description: Apply a celestial blessing through all obstacles, healing for 220 Health every second for 10s.

Ability_3.Description: Channel gravitational energy and lift an enemy up, dealing up to 360 damage over 2.5s. If the victim manages to move while lifted it will interrupt Void Grip.

Ability_4.Description: Lower your weapon and move 65% faster while increasing your jump height and lowering your fall speed.

Ability_5.Description: Lock yourself in place and gather the power of the cosmos for 1.2s becoming CC immune, then unleash your energy in a long range blast that pierces through all obstacles and deals 2400 damage.

Lore: Originally climbing the mountain to escape the ravages of the Second Scourge many generations ago, Jenos was merely a young monk in search of a greater wisdom. After finding it written among the stars, he ascended into the heavens, vanishing for years but leaving behind a small group of followers dedicated to carrying on his legacy. Now, as the Realm descends into war once again, so too has Jenos descended from the stars to walk upon the ground once again, joining the battle for some arcane purpose only he understands.
Name: Jenos
Title: The Ascended
abilityDescription1: An otherworldly weapon that channels the power of the stars. Deals 108 damage every 0.13s at medium range.
abilityDescription2: Apply a celestial blessing through all obstacles, healing for 220 Health every second for 10s.
abilityDescription3: Channel gravitational energy and lift an enemy up, dealing up to 360 damage over 2.5s. If the victim manages to move while lifted it will interrupt Void Grip.
abilityDescription4: Lower your weapon and move 65% faster while increasing your jump height and lowering your fall speed.
abilityDescription5: Lock yourself in place and gather the power of the cosmos for 1.2s becoming CC immune, then unleash your energy in a long range blast that pierces through all obstacles and deals 2400 damage.

Ability_1.Description: Fire one 200 damage shot every 0.26s.

Ability_2.Description: Activate your gauntlets Bulwark with 6000 Health. Regenerates while inactive.

Ability_3.Description: Let out a fearsome shout, briefly granting damage immunity to yourself. Additionally, heal yourself and nearby allies for 1000 health.

Ability_4.Description: Surge forward! Grabbing, stunning, and throwing the first enemy you contact. Deals 600 damage.

Ability_5.Description: Target an enemy and drag them to you. You may move your powerless victim as you see fit or send them flying with a mighty blast.

Lore: The Patriarch of House Aico issued a challenge to his captains: hold the house’s banner for as long as possible. Few were strong enough to last a day. The last captain to receive the test, a young man named Khan, held the banner for hours. As his arms tired, he beckoned to a common servant and asked her to take it from him. “Even though I must fall,” he said, “the banner will remain.” This was no test of strength, but one of loyalty to House Aico. Khan passed the test and proved himself worthy of command. Today, he serves Lian as advisor and protector.
Name: Khan
Title: Primus of house Aico
abilityDescription1: Fire one 200 damage shot every 0.26s.
abilityDescription2: Activate your gauntlets Bulwark with 6000 Health. Regenerates while inactive.
abilityDescription3: Let out a fearsome shout, briefly granting damage immunity to yourself. Additionally, heal yourself and nearby allies for 1000 health.
abilityDescription4: Surge forward! Grabbing, stunning, and throwing the first enemy you contact. Deals 600 damage.
abilityDescription5: Target an enemy and drag them to you. You may move your powerless victim as you see fit or send them flying with a mighty blast.

Ability_1.Description: A combination weapon that fires as an energy carbine or a powerful laser rifle. The carbine does 180 damage per shot every 0.15 seconds.

Ability_2.Description: Charge up and fire a long range attack dealing up to 1200 damage.

Ability_3.Description: Kinessa throws out up to 2 mines that deal 20 damage every 0.2s to connected enemies.

Ability_4.Description: Deploy a Transporter that teleports you to its location after a short duration.

Ability_5.Description: For 5s successful shots made to the upper half of an enemy character will deal 50% increased damage. Your Sniper Shots also do not use ammo.

Lore: As a young recruit in the elite Sentinels unit, Kinessa took to her sniper lessons with an eagerness and enthusiasm that surprised her mentors. Frustrated by the rigors of military life, she left before she could complete her training and struck out on her own. As the Realm descended into chaos and war, vigilante bounty contracts were plentiful, earning her all the fame and fortune she’d lacked while in the service of the Magistrate. She refuses to pick a side in the conflict, though, because it’s much more profitable to contract with both than commit to either.
Name: Kinessa
Title: The Bounty Hunter
abilityDescription1: A combination weapon that fires as an energy carbine or a powerful laser rifle. The carbine does 180 damage per shot every 0.15 seconds.
abilityDescription2: Charge up and fire a long range attack dealing up to 1200 damage.
abilityDescription3: Kinessa throws out up to 2 mines that deal 20 damage every 0.2s to connected enemies.
abilityDescription4: Deploy a Transporter that teleports you to its location after a short duration.
abilityDescription5: For 5s successful shots made to the upper half of an enemy character will deal 50% increased damage. Your Sniper Shots also do not use ammo.

Ability_1.Description:
Fires two rounds each dealing 40 damage every 0.06s.
Hellkite Claws: hurls a fiery slash dealing 600 damage every 0.55s

Ability_2.Description:
Quickly dart forward becoming untargetable for the duration. Consumes 1 unit of Energy. 
Skewer: Dash forward slicing anything in your path for 600 damage. Consumes all Energy.

Ability_3.Description: Unleash your Hellkite Claws. While in this stance you are constantly consuming Energy. Requires 1 unit of Energy available to trigger.

Ability_4.Description:
Move 50% faster and increase jump height for 4s. Consumes 1 unit of Energy.
Passive: Hold <CMD=GBA_Jump> when running into a wall to climb it.

Ability_5.Description: Melt into the shadows becoming untargetable and striking anyone within 25 feet of you for 1500 damage per second over 2s. Goes through shields.

Lore: Once, a nameless street rat challenged the tyrant Zhin. For the boy’s remarkable skills, Zhin granted him a new life in the Thousands Hands Guild, and a new name: Koga. The Guild was Koga’s family and he became their finest ninja. But not all families get along. Jealous lies spread, false evidence was planted, and Zhin’s fury forced Koga to flee. Now the exiled ninja fights for his new family -- The Paladins -- as he searches for the one who betrayed him.
Name: Koga
Title: The Lost Hand
abilityDescription1:
Fires two rounds each dealing 40 damage every 0.06s.
Hellkite Claws: hurls a fiery slash dealing 600 damage every 0.55s
abilityDescription2:
Quickly dart forward becoming untargetable for the duration. Consumes 1 unit of Energy. 
Skewer: Dash forward slicing anything in your path for 600 damage. Consumes all Energy.
abilityDescription3: Unleash your Hellkite Claws. While in this stance you are constantly consuming Energy. Requires 1 unit of Energy available to trigger.
abilityDescription4:
Move 50% faster and increase jump height for 4s. Consumes 1 unit of Energy.
Passive: Hold <CMD=GBA_Jump> when running into a wall to climb it.
abilityDescription5: Melt into the shadows becoming untargetable and striking anyone within 25 feet of you for 1500 damage per second over 2s. Goes through shields.

Ability_1.Description: Dual semi-automatic magnums that deal 350 damage per shot. Effective up to Medium range.

Ability_2.Description: Begin rapidly firing your Magnums at the nearest target to you with perfect aim. Deals 1050 damage over 1.4s. Acts as a weapon attack.

Ability_3.Description: You have a Retribution target that becomes visible through walls when nearby. Killing your target grants additional Credits if they are on a killstreak. Activating Retribution randomly selects a new target.

Ability_4.Description: Activate to quickly slide forward in the direction you are facing, retaining the ability to fire your weapons.

Ability_5.Description: Release an infallible surge of judgement, executing targets at or below 65% Health. Targets above 65% Health will take 600 damage and be slowed for 1s.

Lore: The Outer Tribunal is made up of merciless, oathbound judges, none more dedicated than Lex. He and his partner, Androxus, traveled the fringes of the Realm together, tracking down infamous criminals and battling all manner of horrors on behalf of the Magistrate. After encountering a sinister goddess, though, Androxus abandoned his duties and quickly rose to the top of the most wanted list. Lex, unable to turn his back on the law or the Magistrate, vowed to one day take his former partner in, dead or alive.
Name: Lex
Title: The Hand of Justice
abilityDescription1: Dual semi-automatic magnums that deal 350 damage per shot. Effective up to Medium range.
abilityDescription2: Begin rapidly firing your Magnums at the nearest target to you with perfect aim. Deals 1050 damage over 1.4s. Acts as a weapon attack.
abilityDescription3: You have a Retribution target that becomes visible through walls when nearby. Killing your target grants additional Credits if they are on a killstreak. Activating Retribution randomly selects a new target.
abilityDescription4: Activate to quickly slide forward in the direction you are facing, retaining the ability to fire your weapons.
abilityDescription5: Release an infallible surge of judgement, executing targets at or below 65% Health. Targets above 65% Health will take 600 damage and be slowed for 1s.

Ability_1.Description: A rifle that has been passed down through your noble house for ages. Deals 400 damage every 0.45s at medium range.

Ability_2.Description: Fire a charged shot dealing 400 damage to all enemies in front of you. Acts as a weapon attack.

Ability_3.Description: Charge your rifle for 0.5s then fire a long range shot that pierces enemies and deals 800 damage. Acts as a weapon attack.

Ability_4.Description: Quickly dodge in the direction you are moving and fire a rifle shot dealing 400 damage to the enemy nearest to where you are aiming. Acts as a weapon attack.

Ability_5.Description: Channel the power of your noble blood for 1s becoming CC immune. Then fire a powerful blast that passes through enemies and deals 1600 damage. Killing an enemy with Enlightenment refunds 50% of the charge.

Lore: After plotting to set herself up as the legitimate heiress to the Ruby Throne, nothing stood in Lian’s way. Her sincere dedication to her family’s legacy may have earned her the title of Scion, but her skill with the rifle is what won her the respect of her family’s Royal Guard. When the Magistrate called on all loyal houses to unite against the Resistance, she was honor-bound to accept, arriving from her far-off homeland to represent House Aico along with her faithful bodyguard and general, Khan.
Name: Lian
Title: Scion of House Aico
abilityDescription1: A rifle that has been passed down through your noble house for ages. Deals 400 damage every 0.45s at medium range.
abilityDescription2: Fire a charged shot dealing 400 damage to all enemies in front of you. Acts as a weapon attack.
abilityDescription3: Charge your rifle for 0.5s then fire a long range shot that pierces enemies and deals 800 damage. Acts as a weapon attack.
abilityDescription4: Quickly dodge in the direction you are moving and fire a rifle shot dealing 400 damage to the enemy nearest to where you are aiming. Acts as a weapon attack.
abilityDescription5: Channel the power of your noble blood for 1s becoming CC immune. Then fire a powerful blast that passes through enemies and deals 1600 damage. Killing an enemy with Enlightenment refunds 50% of the charge.

Ability_1.Description: Throw two Daggers every second that each deal 400 Damage.

Ability_2.Description: Quickly Dash Forward. Collide with an enemy to perform a melee Strike for 400 Damage.

Ability_3.Description: Reset the cooldowns of Pounce and Prowl.

Ability_4.Description: Move 50% Faster and increase your jump height for 4s. Firing your weapon or using another ability will cancel Prowl.

Ability_5.Description: Enemies within 300ft have their vision restricted to a 30 foot radius for 4s.

Lore: After making a name for herself as a skilled thief and knife-fighter, the half-tigron Maeve decided to join the war for personal gain, selling her services to the highest bidder. She dashes from shadow to shadow with unnatural agility, concealed by her magical longcoat, a souvenir from one of her most daring burglaries: the Magistrate’s fortress keep. While her employers find her talents useful, they often complain of suspiciously misplaced valuables and lost coins after she moves on to the next fight.
Name: Maeve
Title: of Blades
abilityDescription1: Throw two Daggers every second that each deal 400 Damage.
abilityDescription2: Quickly Dash Forward. Collide with an enemy to perform a melee Strike for 400 Damage.
abilityDescription3: Reset the cooldowns of Pounce and Prowl.
abilityDescription4: Move 50% Faster and increase your jump height for 4s. Firing your weapon or using another ability will cancel Prowl.
abilityDescription5: Enemies within 300ft have their vision restricted to a 30 foot radius for 4s.

Ability_1.Description: A salvaged ship cannon that fires one 650 damage cannon ball every 1s. Effective at Short Range.

Ability_2.Description: Hurl your anchor and reel in an unsuspecting enemy.

Ability_3.Description: Project a 6000 health shield that blocks enemy fire for 4s.

Ability_4.Description: Retreat into your shell and spin forward, knocking back enemies in your path.

Ability_5.Description: Call on the powers of the Ancients. Drop your cannon and swing your anchor, dealing 650 damage a hit. In addition, increase your health by 5000. Lasts 8s.

Lore: Once the dedicated protector of an island home of the Ska’drin, the ancient Makoa has now been summoned to wage war against the Magistrate on the mainland. Though he hopes to one day return to the islands, he fears that the unappeased volcanoes will rend them asunder in his absence. In the meantime, however, he brings both the fury of the ocean and the indomitable resilience of the tortoise spirit, as well as various naval implements, to bear against those who would defile the natural world.
Name: Makoa
Title: The Ancient
abilityDescription1: A salvaged ship cannon that fires one 650 damage cannon ball every 1s. Effective at Short Range.
abilityDescription2: Hurl your anchor and reel in an unsuspecting enemy.
abilityDescription3: Project a 6000 health shield that blocks enemy fire for 4s.
abilityDescription4: Retreat into your shell and spin forward, knocking back enemies in your path.
abilityDescription5: Call on the powers of the Ancients. Drop your cannon and swing your anchor, dealing 650 damage a hit. In addition, increase your health by 5000. Lasts 8s.

Ability_1.Description: Fires as glob of venom every 0.55s dealing 400 damage to a single target. Effective at Short Range. Reloading throws the cobra dealing 200 damage and stunning enemies for 1s.

Ability_2.Description: Summon a spirit to enchant an ally healing 280 Health every second for 5s.

Ability_3.Description: Toss a gourd full of venom that heals allies for 300 Health every second and damages enemies for 200 Damage every second.

Ability_4.Description: Quickly slither forward, becoming untargetable for the duration.

Ability_5.Description: Fire a dark vessel that explodes when it lands, fearing all enemy Champions for 2s.

Lore: When Wekono, the Mother of Sorrow and Revenge, turns her gaze to the mortal world, she appoints a champion. In this cycle, the island witchdoctor Mal’Damba has been gifted with her powers and sent into the war to evangelize her faith by laying waste to any who would stand before him. His mastery of dark magic and virulent poisons was already impressive before the insidious goddess imbued him with even greater abilities, rendering him one of the deadliest beings in the Realm, an extension of Wekono’s will.
Name: Mal'Damba
Title: Wekono's Chosen
abilityDescription1: Fires as glob of venom every 0.55s dealing 400 damage to a single target. Effective at Short Range. Reloading throws the cobra dealing 200 damage and stunning enemies for 1s.
abilityDescription2: Summon a spirit to enchant an ally healing 280 Health every second for 5s.
abilityDescription3: Toss a gourd full of venom that heals allies for 300 Health every second and damages enemies for 200 Damage every second.
abilityDescription4: Quickly slither forward, becoming untargetable for the duration.
abilityDescription5: Fire a dark vessel that explodes when it lands, fearing all enemy Champions for 2s.

Ability_1.Description: Every 0.1s deal 50 damage in a column of magical energy. Every hit applies 1 Magic Mark to the victim, stacking up to 10.

Ability_2.Description: Every 0.6s your familiar fires out a magic projectile that deals 250 Damage. Deal more damage for every stack of Magic Mark on the target.

Ability_3.Description: Project an impenetrable field around your character for 2s. Enemies that damage you while your barrier is active receive 10 stacks of Magic Mark.

Ability_4.Description: Quickly Scamper forward.

Ability_5.Description: Cast an arcane spell that Transforms a single victim into a delicious treat. Coming into contact with your transformed victim executes them and prevents ability-based revival.

Lore: While the rest of the rabbit-like leipori fled to the forests to avoid getting involved in the war raging across the Realm, Moji took it upon herself to summon the great nature spirits to defend the world. She charges into battle atop her trusty familiar, Po-Li, who carries her through the fray as she unleashes a maelstrom of sorcerous destruction on her enemies. Once the war is over and the Realm has returned to its natural state, she hopes to return to the forest and help her people begin the healing process, restoring all that was lost.
Name: Moji
Title: and Friends
abilityDescription1: Every 0.1s deal 50 damage in a column of magical energy. Every hit applies 1 Magic Mark to the victim, stacking up to 10.
abilityDescription2: Every 0.6s your familiar fires out a magic projectile that deals 250 Damage. Deal more damage for every stack of Magic Mark on the target.
abilityDescription3: Project an impenetrable field around your character for 2s. Enemies that damage you while your barrier is active receive 10 stacks of Magic Mark.
abilityDescription4: Quickly Scamper forward.
abilityDescription5: Cast an arcane spell that Transforms a single victim into a delicious treat. Coming into contact with your transformed victim executes them and prevents ability-based revival.

Ability_1.Description: A custom launcher that fires volatile potions every 1s that explode in an area on impact dealing 600 damage per hit.

Ability_2.Description: Fire an explosive flask that deals 150 damage and slows enemies by 50% for 2.5s.

Ability_3.Description: Throw a healing potion that heals teammates for 1200 Health when it explodes. Reactivating the ability will instantly cause Healing Potion to explode.

Ability_4.Description: Quickly launch yourself in the air and jump higher for 2.5s.

Ability_5.Description: Throw a flask that deals 200 damage and turns enemies into chickens with 1500 health for 4s. Victims are returned to their previous state when the effect ends.

Lore: Unlike most other vulpin, Pip chose to specialize in weaponized explosives instead of curative alchemy. He left Brightmarsh, his homeland, in search of adventure across the Realm. Now he splits his time between brewing up all sorts of fiery concoctions to use against the Magistrate’s forces and creating restorative potions to aid his friends. While his allies have come to appreciate his assistance and expertise, they fully understand that the little fox is as unpredictable as he is dangerous.
Name: Pip
Title: The Rogue Alchemist
abilityDescription1: A custom launcher that fires volatile potions every 1s that explode in an area on impact dealing 600 damage per hit.
abilityDescription2: Fire an explosive flask that deals 150 damage and slows enemies by 50% for 2.5s.
abilityDescription3: Throw a healing potion that heals teammates for 1200 Health when it explodes. Reactivating the ability will instantly cause Healing Potion to explode.
abilityDescription4: Quickly launch yourself in the air and jump higher for 2.5s.
abilityDescription5: Throw a flask that deals 200 damage and turns enemies into chickens with 1500 health for 4s. Victims are returned to their previous state when the effect ends.

Ability_1.Description: Incredibly fast firing miniguns that deal 40 damage per shot every 0.04 seconds once fully spun up. Maintain fire to continually speed up the rate of fire. Effective at Medium Range.

Ability_2.Description: Fire two missiles that deal 250 damage each in a large area.

Ability_3.Description: Create an energy shield around yourself for 3.5s, absorbing 2500 damage.

Ability_4.Description: Quickly jet in the direction you are moving. You can fire while using Advance. Has 2 charges.

Ability_5.Description: Reveal two additional miniguns that deal 120 damage every 0.04 seconds and two rocket launchers that deal 250 damage every .25 seconds. Your Movement Speed is reduced during Hexa Fire but you gain 10% damage reduction.

Lore: While toiling in the gold mines, a particularly wily and inventive goblin named Ruckus stumbled upon the long-lost mind-stone of a fallen war golem. He installed the relic into his mechanical digging suit, hoping it would provide the suit with enough power to outperform the other miners. But he was surprised when the ancient sentience reawakened and brought the suit to life. Though it resented its situation, its pilot, and the name it was given, Bolt nonetheless agreed to a tentative partnership, one that freed them both to scour the Realm in search of fame, fortune, and upgrades.
Name: Ruckus
Title: The Worst of Friends
abilityDescription1: Incredibly fast firing miniguns that deal 40 damage per shot every 0.04 seconds once fully spun up. Maintain fire to continually speed up the rate of fire. Effective at Medium Range.
abilityDescription2: Fire two missiles that deal 250 damage each in a large area.
abilityDescription3: Create an energy shield around yourself for 3.5s, absorbing 2500 damage.
abilityDescription4: Quickly jet in the direction you are moving. You can fire while using Advance. Has 2 charges.
abilityDescription5: Reveal two additional miniguns that deal 120 damage every 0.04 seconds and two rocket launchers that deal 250 damage every .25 seconds. Your Movement Speed is reduced during Hexa Fire but you gain 10% damage reduction.

Ability_1.Description: Fire a Stream of magic projectiles from your hand that deal 210 damage every 0.3s. Your projectiles pass through enemies and apply a Soul Orb stack with every hit. Stacks up to 4 times.

Ability_2.Description: Restore the soul of an ally, Healing them for 1000 health every second for 2s.

Ability_3.Description: Detonate all of your active Soul Charges. Deal 100 damage to the afflicted enemy for every charge detonated. Every charge detonated also heals you for 15% of your maximum life.

Ability_4.Description: Step into another plane of reality for 4s. While this ability is active you are in stealth and immune to all harmful effects.

Ability_5.Description: Cast your soul core into the battlefield. After a delay, a tear in reality will manifest and drag in nearby enemies.

Lore: A being from beyond the void, Seris has taken the name of the city she completely destroyed upon first setting foot in the world of the living. Draining the souls of her enemies and occasionally restoring them to her allies, however, pales in comparison to her unnatural prescience, granting her the ability to see into the past and predict the future all at once. She appears here and there in time and space, always at the opportune moment to change the course of events toward some unknown but seemingly inevitable fate.
Name: Seris
Title: Oracle of the Abyss
abilityDescription1: Fire a Stream of magic projectiles from your hand that deal 210 damage every 0.3s. Your projectiles pass through enemies and apply a Soul Orb stack with every hit. Stacks up to 4 times.
abilityDescription2: Restore the soul of an ally, Healing them for 1000 health every second for 2s.
abilityDescription3: Detonate all of your active Soul Charges. Deal 100 damage to the afflicted enemy for every charge detonated. Every charge detonated also heals you for 15% of your maximum life.
abilityDescription4: Step into another plane of reality for 4s. While this ability is active you are in stealth and immune to all harmful effects.
abilityDescription5: Cast your soul core into the battlefield. After a delay, a tear in reality will manifest and drag in nearby enemies.

Ability_1.Description: A long bow that draws back an arrow and releases it for up to 1000 damage every 1.5s.

Ability_2.Description: Replace your arrow with an Impaler Arrow that knocks enemies back and stuns them for 1s if they hit a wall.

Ability_3.Description: Plant yourself in place, becoming stationary for 3s. While planted, your Long Bow draw time is 200% faster. Re-activating Planted cancels the ability. Acts as a weapon attack.

Ability_4.Description: Leap backwards and enter stealth for 2s.

Ability_5.Description: Enter stealth and gain 30% Movement Speed for 8s. While active, you draw your bow 50% faster and reveal yourself each time you fire.

Lore: Tales of the legendary adventurer Sha Lin have spread far and wide across the Realm, recounting his heroic exploits and death-defying antics. During his short lifetime, he’s already helped topple warlords, recovered long-lost artifacts, and betrayed the infamous Thousand Hands guild. He’s broken as many hearts with his magical longbow as he has with his silver tongue, but even he has a stake in the current conflict between the Magistrate and the Resistance, standing up to the oppressive Magistrate on behalf of the common folk.
Name: Sha Lin
Title: The Desert Wind
abilityDescription1: A long bow that draws back an arrow and releases it for up to 1000 damage every 1.5s.
abilityDescription2: Replace your arrow with an Impaler Arrow that knocks enemies back and stuns them for 1s if they hit a wall.
abilityDescription3: Plant yourself in place, becoming stationary for 3s. While planted, your Long Bow draw time is 200% faster. Re-activating Planted cancels the ability. Acts as a weapon attack.
abilityDescription4: Leap backwards and enter stealth for 2s.
abilityDescription5: Enter stealth and gain 30% Movement Speed for 8s. While active, you draw your bow 50% faster and reveal yourself each time you fire.

Ability_1.Description: A wrist-mounted energy crossbow that deals 130 damage per shot every 0.1 seconds. Effective at Short Range.

Ability_2.Description: Fires 3 bolts in succession, each dealing 10% maximum Health damage over 4s.

Ability_3.Description: Create a cloud of darkness that lasts 5s, blocking all enemy vision in or out of it. Gain stealth for 3s when entering the cloud.

Ability_4.Description: Enter stealth for 7.5s. Getting too close to enemy players will reveal you while in stealth.

Ability_5.Description: Throw a bomb that deals 3000 damage and destroys all shields.

Lore: Noble by birth, Skye abandoned a life of luxury and wealth to pursue her dreams of excitement and adventure. During her time spent on the streets, interacting with the criminal underworld of the Realm, she discovered a natural talent and boundless passion for killing. When her career as a contract assassin brought her fame and fortune, she caught the Magistrate’s attention and now serves as one of Grand Magister Karne’s closest advisors. To her the War of the Realm is just a long-term contract, one that won’t end until the last of the Paladins are dealt with.
Name: Skye
Title: The Twilight Assassin
abilityDescription1: A wrist-mounted energy crossbow that deals 130 damage per shot every 0.1 seconds. Effective at Short Range.
abilityDescription2: Fires 3 bolts in succession, each dealing 10% maximum Health damage over 4s.
abilityDescription3: Create a cloud of darkness that lasts 5s, blocking all enemy vision in or out of it. Gain stealth for 3s when entering the cloud.
abilityDescription4: Enter stealth for 7.5s. Getting too close to enemy players will reveal you while in stealth.
abilityDescription5: Throw a bomb that deals 3000 damage and destroys all shields.

Ability_1.Description:
A powerful rifle that fires one 1200 damage shot every second.
Side Arm: A semi-automatic pistol that deals 220 damage per shot.

Ability_2.Description:
Look down your scope and gain pin point accuracy.
Flare: Fire a flare that reveals enemies in a large radius.

Ability_3.Description: Switch to your other weapon.

Ability_4.Description: Enter stealth and hide yourself from vision. While in Stealth your energy is consumed.

Ability_5.Description: Throw a Flash Bang grenade that detonate on contact blinding nearby enemies for 3s.

Lore: Having spent most of his life in the military, Strix was an invaluable member of the Sentinels, tasked with training their elite sharpshooters. He was reassigned after the unit was disbanded, sent to the front lines with the regular army as it prepared to put down the Resistance. Always the calm and composed professional, he is the master of stealth and camouflage, able to pick off high value targets before the enemy is even aware of his presence -- or that they are under attack at all.
Name: Strix
Title: Ghost Feather
abilityDescription1:
A powerful rifle that fires one 1200 damage shot every second.
Side Arm: A semi-automatic pistol that deals 220 damage per shot.
abilityDescription2:
Look down your scope and gain pin point accuracy.
Flare: Fire a flare that reveals enemies in a large radius.
abilityDescription3: Switch to your other weapon.
abilityDescription4: Enter stealth and hide yourself from vision. While in Stealth your energy is consumed.
abilityDescription5: Throw a Flash Bang grenade that detonate on contact blinding nearby enemies for 3s.

Ability_1.Description: A short to medium ranged weapon that deals 110 damage every 0.1s.

Ability_2.Description: Charge forward, hitting an enemy for 600 and knocking them straight back.

Ability_3.Description: Overcharge your weapon, causing it to fire 33% faster for 3s without consuming ammo.

Ability_4.Description: Inscribe a rune on the ground that will teleport you back to its location after 10s or when reactivated. Teleporting cleanses all effects and heals for 500.

Ability_5.Description: After a brief charge-up, target an enemy and travel directly to them from anywhere, dealing 600 damage and knocking them back.

Lore: Talus might still be young and overly optimistic, but he’s got big plans. After almost losing his family to an angry mob that refused to accept the otherworldly Ska’drin as neighbors, he set out on a quest for knowledge. From the shores of an abandoned island paradise to the darkened corridors of the Deepwerks, he uncovered forgotten truths as well as unlocking his inborn aptitude. When the Paladins rose up to oppose the Magistrate, he joined them, eager to put his newfound abilities to work and prove that the Ska’drin deserve a place in the Realm.
Name: Talus
Title: of the Ska'drin
abilityDescription1: A short to medium ranged weapon that deals 110 damage every 0.1s.
abilityDescription2: Charge forward, hitting an enemy for 600 and knocking them straight back.
abilityDescription3: Overcharge your weapon, causing it to fire 33% faster for 3s without consuming ammo.
abilityDescription4: Inscribe a rune on the ground that will teleport you back to its location after 10s or when reactivated. Teleporting cleanses all effects and heals for 500.
abilityDescription5: After a brief charge-up, target an enemy and travel directly to them from anywhere, dealing 600 damage and knocking them back.

Ability_1.Description: Swing your axe in a large arc every 1.1s. Enemies hit will take 650 damage.

Ability_2.Description: Fire a projectile that deals 250 damage. Fire an additional projectile for every Calamity Charge you have stored.

Ability_3.Description: Create a powerful funnel that absorbs enemy ranged attacks. For every 1200 damage absorbed you generate and store a Calamity Charge. You may store up to 4 Calamity Charges.

Ability_4.Description: Leap into the air and bring down your axe in a vicious smash dealing 500 damage and slowing enemies in front of you by 60% for 2s.

Ability_5.Description: Return to life after 2.5s in a large explosion of necromantic energy that deals 4000 damage to affected enemies.

Lore: Whatever Terminus once was, he has since become an instrument of war fighting on behalf of the Magistrate. His mind and memories are long gone, his broken body bound by dark sorcery and unstable magic crystals. His lifeless yet undying state may be a mere shadow of his former self, but it has also rid him of hesitation and fear. He obediently charges into battle with reckless abandon, hefting a terrifying battle axe that few mortals could lift and even fewer could hope to endure.
Name: Terminus
Title: The Fallen
abilityDescription1: Swing your axe in a large arc every 1.1s. Enemies hit will take 650 damage.
abilityDescription2: Fire a projectile that deals 250 damage. Fire an additional projectile for every Calamity Charge you have stored.
abilityDescription3: Create a powerful funnel that absorbs enemy ranged attacks. For every 1200 damage absorbed you generate and store a Calamity Charge. You may store up to 4 Calamity Charges.
abilityDescription4: Leap into the air and bring down your axe in a vicious smash dealing 500 damage and slowing enemies in front of you by 60% for 2s.
abilityDescription5: Return to life after 2.5s in a large explosion of necromantic energy that deals 4000 damage to affected enemies.

Ability_1.Description: Fire blasts of energy every 0.25s dealing 180 damage per shot.

Ability_2.Description: Focus the power of your gauntlet and channel a beam of energy on a single enemy for 2.5s, silencing them and dealing 800 damage over the duration.

Ability_3.Description: Project a 2000 Health shield onto an ally for 3s.

Ability_4.Description: Regenerate 2125 Shield Health over 1s.

Ability_5.Description: Unleash the latent power of your Gauntlet, channeling a blast that applies a massive knockback to all enemies for 2.35s.

Lore: As the ranking scholar and preeminent authority on runic lore at the Deepwerks facility, Torvald is one of the architects of the wave of crystal-powered technology sweeping across the Realm. Though he would much rather have his nose buried in a dusty old history tome or reach into a swirling vortex of magical energy using his enhanced stone gauntlet, he understands that the Magistrate is the driving force behind all his research and has joined their effort to put down the Resistance. Once the war is over, he can once more get back to work.
Name: Torvald
Title: The Runic Sage
abilityDescription1: Fire blasts of energy every 0.25s dealing 180 damage per shot.
abilityDescription2: Focus the power of your gauntlet and channel a beam of energy on a single enemy for 2.5s, silencing them and dealing 800 damage over the duration.
abilityDescription3: Project a 2000 Health shield onto an ally for 3s.
abilityDescription4: Regenerate 2125 Shield Health over 1s.
abilityDescription5: Unleash the latent power of your Gauntlet, channeling a blast that applies a massive knockback to all enemies for 2.35s.

Ability_1.Description: Fire one shot every 0.09s that deals 120 damage. Effective up to Medium Range.

Ability_2.Description: Fire a grenade that deals 700 damage in a small area of effect.

Ability_3.Description: Hurl an incendiary device that leaves a pool of fire for 6s. Enemies that contact the fire will burn for 9% of their maximum health over 0.6s and have their healing reduced by 50%. Continued Contact refreshes this effect.

Ability_4.Description: Mark an enemy for 6s. Marked enemies are revealed and take 15% increased damage from your basic attacks.

Ability_5.Description: Gain 40% attack speed and 40% movement speed for 4.5s. Firing does not consume ammo.

Lore: Raised to shoot straight and survive the harsh winters of the frontier, Tyra signed on with the Magistrate army at a young age. After the Sentinels’ disastrous final mission, she returned to her homeland to make a living tracking down the monstrous threats to the common folk that lurked beyond the fringes of the Realm. Her unyielding stamina and pinpoint accuracy with the rifle serve her well in her new role: helping the Resistance fight back against the Magistrate and bring an end to the war that rages across the Realm.
Name: Tyra
Title: The Untamed
abilityDescription1: Fire one shot every 0.09s that deals 120 damage. Effective up to Medium Range.
abilityDescription2: Fire a grenade that deals 700 damage in a small area of effect.
abilityDescription3: Hurl an incendiary device that leaves a pool of fire for 6s. Enemies that contact the fire will burn for 9% of their maximum health over 0.6s and have their healing reduced by 50%. Continued Contact refreshes this effect.
abilityDescription4: Mark an enemy for 6s. Marked enemies are revealed and take 15% increased damage from your basic attacks.
abilityDescription5: Gain 40% attack speed and 40% movement speed for 4.5s. Firing does not consume ammo.

Ability_1.Description: Fire one shot every 0.1s that deals 135 damage. Effective up to Medium Range.

Ability_2.Description: Look down the barrel of your rifle. Gain improved accuracy but move 50% Slower.

Ability_3.Description: Throw a fragmentation grenade dealing up to 750 damage. Holding <CMD=GBA_Ability_2> will cook the grenade and reduce its detonation time.

Ability_4.Description: Lower your weapon and run 65% faster.

Ability_5.Description: Bring up your Targeting Binoculars. Click on Enemy players to guide an artillery shell dealing 1400 damage to their location. Viktor's Movement speed is slowed while channeling Barrage.

Lore: The former commander of the Sentinels, an elite Magistrate military unit, Viktor lives in the shadow of his former glory. He took the blame for what happened during their final mission, was stripped of his rank, and reassigned to a lower position by Grand Magister Karne. His training and skill as a soldier remains unparalleled, though, along with his unwavering loyalty to the Magistrate. Determined to regain his standing, he pushes himself well beyond his limits in battle against the Resistance, striving to end the rebellion before it picks up any further momentum.
Name: Viktor
Title: The Lone Wolf
abilityDescription1: Fire one shot every 0.1s that deals 135 damage. Effective up to Medium Range.
abilityDescription2: Look down the barrel of your rifle. Gain improved accuracy but move 50% Slower.
abilityDescription3: Throw a fragmentation grenade dealing up to 750 damage. Holding <CMD=GBA_Ability_2> will cook the grenade and reduce its detonation time.
abilityDescription4: Lower your weapon and run 65% faster.
abilityDescription5: Bring up your Targeting Binoculars. Click on Enemy players to guide an artillery shell dealing 1400 damage to their location. Viktor's Movement speed is slowed while channeling Barrage.

Ability_1.Description: Fire a shot every 0.14s dealing 170 damage. Effective up to Medium range. While firing you move 50% slower.

Ability_2.Description: Look down the barrel of your machine gun. You gain improved accuracy but move 50% slower. The slow does not stack with firing your gun.

Ability_3.Description: Project a frontal shield that blocks 1400 damage for 6s. You may fire while Deflector Shield is active.

Ability_4.Description: Throw out up to 2 deployable sensors that reveal enemies to your team in a large radius.

Ability_5.Description: Summon two Sentinel Drones that fire energy blasts while you shoot your Light Machine Gun. Each Sentinel fires once per second dealing 200 damage and has 1200 health. Sentinels persist until destroyed or the player is killed.

Lore: Rapidly rising through the ranks of the Magistrate, Vivian’s clever, persistent scheming got her appointed to the Deepwerks facility, where she was the first to recognize the military potential of the research they were conducting. In the swirling chaos of the war with the Paladins, she sees only the opportunity to advance her station in life. Equipped with some of the most advanced crystal-powered weaponry ever created, she joined the battle not to prove herself or follow orders, but to silence the lone witness of her true plans.
Name: Vivian
Title: The Cunning
abilityDescription1: Fire a shot every 0.14s dealing 170 damage. Effective up to Medium range. While firing you move 50% slower.
abilityDescription2: Look down the barrel of your machine gun. You gain improved accuracy but move 50% slower. The slow does not stack with firing your gun.
abilityDescription3: Project a frontal shield that blocks 1400 damage for 6s. You may fire while Deflector Shield is active.
abilityDescription4: Throw out up to 2 deployable sensors that reveal enemies to your team in a large radius.
abilityDescription5: Summon two Sentinel Drones that fire energy blasts while you shoot your Light Machine Gun. Each Sentinel fires once per second dealing 200 damage and has 1200 health. Sentinels persist until destroyed or the player is killed.

Ability_1.Description: Fire a blast of Fae energy that deals 500 damage every 0.75s.

Ability_2.Description: Fire out a toxic spore that deals 100 damage and prevents all healing in an area for 5s. Enemies affected by the spore that move out of the infested area cannot be healed for 2s.

Ability_3.Description: Toss a seed that explodes after a 1 second fuse, dealing 400 damage and spawning 4 additional seeds that each explode for 400 damage after 1 second.

Ability_4.Description: Quickly flutter your wings and propel yourself forwards and upwards.

Ability_5.Description: Harness the power of the Fae and take to the sky for 10s.

Lore: Though short-lived and even-tempered, the faeries of the Summer Court wage an endless war against the encroachment of modern civilization. Willo might only have three summers to her name, but her aggressive demeanor more than make up for her lack of experience. She charges into the fray with an eagerness and tenacity that worries the precious few remaining faeries. At a time when the fae should be regrouping to bolster their dwindling numbers, Willo has taken it upon herself to attack both the Magistrate and the Resistance against them.
Name: Willo
Title: of the Summer Court
abilityDescription1: Fire a blast of Fae energy that deals 500 damage every 0.75s.
abilityDescription2: Fire out a toxic spore that deals 100 damage and prevents all healing in an area for 5s. Enemies affected by the spore that move out of the infested area cannot be healed for 2s.
abilityDescription3: Toss a seed that explodes after a 1 second fuse, dealing 400 damage and spawning 4 additional seeds that each explode for 400 damage after 1 second.
abilityDescription4: Quickly flutter your wings and propel yourself forwards and upwards.
abilityDescription5: Harness the power of the Fae and take to the sky for 10s.

Ability_1.Description: Fires a continuous beam for a short period that deals 5 ticks of 90 damage over 0.2s every 0.5s. Effective up to Medium Range.

Ability_2.Description: Shatter all active Illusions, causing them to chase down enemies and explode for 500 damage.

Ability_3.Description: Create an illusion that heals a nearby ally for 420 every second.

Ability_4.Description: For 4s, swap locations with the furthest illusion. If none are deployed, it will take Ying to the location of the last active Illusion.

Ability_5.Description: Apply a buff on all allies that heals for 600 health per second for 8s. While this buff is active Dimensional Link may now teleport you to any ally.

Lore: A talented young spellcaster, Ying is a master of illusions and trickery, able to befuddle her opponents with bewildering misdirection. That same magic can also soothe the minds of her allies to ease their suffering and mend their wounds. She made good use of those skills to escape imprisonment by a bandit king and during her days as an adventurer afterward. When the Magistrate began its campaign of conquest, subjugating the Realm in an attempt to restrict the use of magic by the common folk, she felt it was her responsibility to join the fight against the tyranny.
Name: Ying
Title: The Blossom
abilityDescription1: Fires a continuous beam for a short period that deals 5 ticks of 90 damage over 0.2s every 0.5s. Effective up to Medium Range.
abilityDescription2: Shatter all active Illusions, causing them to chase down enemies and explode for 500 damage.
abilityDescription3: Create an illusion that heals a nearby ally for 420 every second.
abilityDescription4: For 4s, swap locations with the furthest illusion. If none are deployed, it will take Ying to the location of the last active Illusion.
abilityDescription5: Apply a buff on all allies that heals for 600 health per second for 8s. While this buff is active Dimensional Link may now teleport you to any ally.

Ability_1.Description: Within 2s, Hurl burning oil with two quick swings that deal 400 damage and a heavy swing that deals 700 damage.

Ability_2.Description: Enter a counter stance for 1.5s. If you take an enemy hit to the front of your character you negate any effects of the hit and counter attack with a melee strike dealing 560 damage.

Ability_3.Description: Disperse into smoke, become un-targetable and gain +20% movement speed for 2s.

Ability_4.Description: Lunge forward while swinging your blade in a deadly arc dealing 400 damage to nearby enemies.

Ability_5.Description: Launch forward and incapacitate an enemy with a series of vicious melee attacks dealing 2000 damage over 1.5s.

Lore: Robbed of his noble lineage, Zhin ruthlessly carved out his own throne atop of the criminal underworld. By the time he was a man, he’d won the loyalty of enough thieves, assassins, and corrupt bureaucrats to build his own shadowy empire: the Thousand Hands guild. Anyone scheming against him had a way of vanishing in the middle of the night, while those who confronted him directly met their doom at the end of his wicked flaming sword. He refuses to pick a side in the war, as there’s more profit to be made playing them against each other.
Name: Zhin
Title: The Tyrant
